parameter.name: at
parameter.shortdesc: The Column's location relative to the reference object or within the table.  &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: The reference object must be within the table. Required only when the at value contains before or after. Can accept: Row, Column, Cell or Table. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Column &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Column.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Column with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Column with the specified name.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Columns within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Column, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Column, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Column, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Column, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Column in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Column in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Column in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Column with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Column that follows the desired Column.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Column whose index follows the specified Column in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Column whose index comes before the desired Column.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Column in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Column in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Column.
Returns the Column with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
